description:
A compact solution for your tooth brushing needs when travelling or camping. The refillable toothpaste tube holds enough toothpaste for about 30 brushings, and stores conveniently in the handle during travel.

  • Toothbrush handle and cap are DuraStar™ polymer for years of reliable use
  • Soft-bristled toothbrush heads are replaceable
  • Refillable toothpaste tube stores in toothbrush handle
  • Toothbrush cap doubles as a rinse cup
  • Three colours – please let us choose
  • Aurelle is a contributing member of 1% for the Planet
name: Aurelle Toob Travel Toothbrush
